content: विदग्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Burnt up, consumed by fire. {@--2@} Cooked. {@--3@} Digested. {@--4@} Destroyed, decomposed. {@--5@} Clever, shrewd, sharp, subtle; <ls>Pt. 1. 164</ls>; <ls>U. 4. 21.</ls> {@--6@} Crafty, artful, intriguing. {@--7@} Unburnt or ill-digested. {@--8@} Lovely, charming. {@--9@} Respectable (as dress &c.). --ग्धः {@--1@} A wise or learned man, scholar. {@--2@} A libertine. --ग्धा A shrewd and clever woman, an artful woman.
